Class WordCounterGame

java.lang.Object
WordCounterGame
public class WordCounterGame extends Object
This class is used to store all the necessary information for this project(the game) to function
Author:
Kyle Chen

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private int
    length
    How many character the word have, in order to be able to insert into wordUsed

    life
    The amount of mistakes the user can make before it is game over
    private int
    score
    The amount of words that the user successfully inputted into wordUsed
    private int
    scoreReached
    The amount of words that the user need to successfully inputted in order to win

  • Constructor Details

    • WordCounterGame

      public WordCounterGame()
      Initialized the game by making a WordCounterGame object with value that is randomized

    • WordCounterGame

      public WordCounterGame(int lifeAmount, int lengthAmount, int scoreAmount)
      Initialized the game by making a WordCounterGame object with value that is set by user
      Parameters:
      lifeAmount - The amount of mistake that the user can have
      lengthAmount - How long the word have to be without considering it as a mistake
      scoreAmount - The score the user have to reach, the amount of word the user have to successfully inputted

      Returns:
      The number of how many word are successfully inputted

    • getLife

      public int getLife()

    • checkWord

      public boolean checkWord(String word)
      Return the value true or false if the word that is being inputted have the correct length and wasn't used before
      Parameters:
      word - the word the user is inputting in and is checking if they successfully inputted it
      Returns:
      True or false if the word the user inputted in satisfied all the conditions
